articles.title: Contact Us
articles.contents: We are also actively recruiting collaborators to help organize this conference. Please send us an email here if you interested!

articles.title: Cascadia Advanced Genomic Technologies
articles.contents:
The Cascadia Advanced Genomic Technologies (CAGT) Meeting aims to unite the research community across the Pacific Northwest to foster collaboration and drive innovation in mammalian genomics. This conference will spotlight cutting-edge advancements in genomic technologies while addressing critical challenges within the field. Themes that will be covered in this conference includes:


Synthetic Biology


Celluar engineering


Genomics


Machine learning and computational biology



The inaugural CAGT Meeting will take place at the University of British Columbia on June 19-20. Stay Tuned for more updates!

articles.title: Registration
articles.contents:
Join us for Synbio 6.0 by securing your spot today. The registration fee of 210 CAD provides you with full access to the conference sessions, materials, networking and meals.


Important Dates


Date
Registration Opens
February 12th 2024
Registration Ends
May 9th 2024
Abstract Submission Deadline
April 26th 2024
Conference
May 16th - May 17th 2024

Abstract Submission:

Abstract submission is now closed

Accomodation:
Attendees can reserve their stay on UBC campus here. Rooms on campus fill up faster during this season, so we recommend reserving your accomodation as soon as you register.
Cancellation Policy
Attendees can get a full refund if they cancel over 60 days before the conference. Cancellations made between 30 to 60 days prior are eligible for a 50% refund. No refunds are provided for cancellations within 30 days of the event. All cancellation refunds incur a 35 CAD administrative charge.
